title: How to create a 'Planned interactions' Timeline Report
filename: 05. How to create a 'Planned interactions' Timeline Report.docx
full_text:
05. How to create a ‘Planned Interactions’ Timeline Report   
You can use this report to view planned interactions, for example, to view all upcoming Appointments which have been scheduled.  
Click on the Administration ‘cog’ in the vertical menu on the left hand side – 
This will open the Administration Menu, click on ‘Reports’ –
This will open the reports menu. To create a new report, click on the 
  ‘Blue Plus’ in the top right corner.  
You can now create a new report, choose ‘Timeline’ from the drop down box. 
Give your report a title (remember reports stay in the report list) 
Choose your date range – to view upcoming planned interactions this must be in the future. If you wish to view interactions which were planned, and not completed, select your chosen date range.  
Choose the resident / residents or leave at ‘All’ (if you start typing a name in the box, it will auto-populate) - 
Select the interactions (it will auto-populate if you start typing in the box) or leave as ‘All’ if you wish to view all planned interactions.  
Untick Closed and Cancelled. 
Make sure Planned is ticked.  
Leave all other boxes as they are.   
You can then select your format (recommended PDF) 
Click Save  
You can now download your report.
